text: Ndithudi a Chisilamu amene amakhulupirira ndi amuna ndi akazi okhulupirira, amuna ndi akazi a chilungamo, amuna ndi akazi opirira, amuna ndi akazi ofatsa, amuna ndi akazi othandiza osauka, amuna ndi akazi osala, ndi amuna ndi akazi osachita chiwerewere ndi amuna ndi akazi amene amakumbukira Mulungu kwambiri; kwa anthu onse otere, Mulungu wawakonzera chikhululukiro ndi mphotho yaikulu
